name: What should be my first caster ever ?
author: varlak74

posts.author: varlak74
posts.content:
Hi, I've never played heavy caster build and I'm wondering what would be a good start ?

I was thinking about the old, exalted sorceress build from bioware but is a wizard more appropriate for a first take ? I feel like the billion skill point to put in wizard build be heavy for a noob caster.

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Sorc is much easier in principle than Wizard imo.

Just be careful about spell selection and everything should be ok.

Oh, and Sorc is a meta-magical Tour de Force!  Don't forget your Meta-Magical feats!

posts.author: conlaoch
posts.content:
Here is one of my favorite casters for new worlds.   You get rogue goodness, HIPS as a safety net, and a full wizards spellbook.  The wizard side matures slowly, but you get all the rogue goodies and HIPS to fill in the gap.  

I'm sure this build can be optimized more, but it's decently fun as it is and has a fun story to introduce itself.

The Galdring Pukje

 If you want something more caster focused,

here are two classics...
http://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/buil ... 31822.html
http://world-of-greyhawk.github.io/buil ... 52820.html

Or some nice ones from our current archives....
runes-desolation-wizard-26-fighter-6-di ... 55263.html
sorcerous-blade-supreme-wizard-26-ftr-6 ... 55876.html
ehlonna-s-arch-magus-sorcerer-38-cleric ... 55545.html

Once you are more familiar with casters, there are a bunch of real good ones here in our archives...

Any caster by GrizzledDwarfLord,  Whizard, Orion, or Valefor
Casters by Maximillian Kane, but make sure you are comfortable playing a min/maxxed build.  He builds for endgame power, sometimes at the expense of early game ease of levelling...

That should give you 40-50 to choose from., probably 20-30 of them just from GDL alone.
